source.67c27888:
db["value"] = [i[1:] for i in db["value"]]
db["value"].head()   # We removed "€". Now we should look for "M" or "K". If it is "M" we will multiply the value with 1.000.000 and if it is "K" we will multiply the value with 1.000.
source.ab351f0d:
db["value"] = [float(i.rstrip("M"))*1000000 if i.endswith("M")==True else float(i.rstrip("K"))*1000 if i.endswith("K")==True else float(i) for i in db["value"]]
print(db["value"].head())
print(db["value"].tail())

* At age 20, players overall rankings nearly 60-62.
* At age 25, players overall rankings mainly at 69-72.
* Generally players overall rankings increasing due to age until 29. After this age players overall rankings are reducing.
